entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who was left on his aunt and uncle's doorstep by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts school, and had planned for Harry's arrival.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A magical school where Harry was sent to learn magic.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is in danger of returning to power.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left Harry on his aunt and uncle's doorstep when he was a baby.
Voldemort had threatened Harry's life, which is why Dumbledore kept him alive by leaving him with his aunt and uncle.
